p: The results obtained are shown as means ± standard error of the mean from three replicates ( n = 3). The p-value < 0.05 was used to denote significant differences between mean values determined using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) and the Duncan’s multiple range test done using the assistance of IBM ® SPSS ® Statistics program 20.0 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA).
